title: Patrick Senécal présente
overview: The series Patrick Senécal présente is five dark stories of 30 minutes each. Each episode, written by Patrick Senécal, explores the author's twisted universe, be it suspense, horror, fantasy or even dark humor. Whether it features a mysterious interrogation, disturbing children, a strange hearing, a particular cell phone, or a seemingly quiet little town, each of these stories will happily show you the worst that can happen ...
